message:
Jobs: Quality Control Engineer 1 year Experience

Diagnosoft for Healthcare (www.diagnosoft.com) is now hiring a Quality Control Engineer with the following specs:
B.Sc. or M.Sc. in Computer Science or Engineering.
Minimum 1 year experience in testing (Functional, Integration, Regression, and User Acceptance).
Knowledge of testing Automation.
Knowledge with all phases of software testing 
In-depth knowledge test case creation and test case execution.
Solid knowledge with software technologies including: HTML, XML, C++, and .NET.
Knowledge of Team Foundation Server (TFS) is a plus.
Knowledge of Agile development life life cycles.
ISTQB Certificate is a plus.
Please send your resume to suha.maarouf@diagnosoft.com and write (QCOY) in the subject line of the email
story: Mohamed Sameeh Sharaf shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
